texts.name: Lv Mu
texts.biography: Lv Mu is a giant snake and possesses the ability to control the mind of all breeds of snakes.

specialty.description:
{Snake Graspers and Snake Bearers}

Increases Speed of any Snake Graspers and Snake Bearers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 5 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Snake Graspers
